title: Monday Post Show (4-12-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (4-12-21)
description:
Bobby just landed in California and does the Post Show from Los Angeles. Bobby talks about how him and Caitlin have been battling what decade of country is the best: 90’s vs. 00’s. Bobby says he’s not a fan of Caitlin’s favorite Tim McGraw song. Bobby talks about seeing the guys from For King & Country on the flight. We also catch up on our weekends. Bobby on what he has left to do for American Idol coming up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
